properties.description: creating a view of personnel area for PBI reports

source: ## Checking the Environment
#### If dev or test, limiting the number of output rows and anonymisation of the sensitive fields is required.

from odw.core.util.util import Util
from notebookutils import mssparkutils
storage_account=Util.get_storage_account()

is_dev = 'dev' in storage_account
is_test = 'test' in storage_account

# limiting the number of output to 20 rows for dev environment
max_limit = 20 if is_dev else 100000000

spark.sql(f"SET MAX_LIMIT = {max_limit}")

#### Serice User types
To identify the service users we need to consider both applications and appeals. For these customers we have the following different types we need to consider.

1. **Applicants**. These are the people who are applying for the planning permission. These could be from pre-applications (S51 advice) or applications (nsip_project & service_user). Data from this group will come from both Horizon and service bus.
2. **RepresentationContact**. These are the people/business that are representing the applicant. Again this data will come from both Horizon and the service bus
3. **Agents**. These are a specific type of representative for the applicant. They are businesses that work with the applicant to help them navigate the planning process. Again these could come from Horizon or the service_user feed .
4. **Subscriber**. Someone showing an interesting in a planning application, and has subscribed online
5. **Appeallant**. Someone who is objecting to a planning application

if spark._jsparkSession.catalog().tableExists('db_name', 'tableName'):
    print("service_user exists. Moving on to maintaining")
else:
    print("Need to create table")
    df = spark.sql("""
        SELECT
            id
            ,salutation
            ,firstName
            ,lastName
            ,addressline1 AS addressLine1
            ,addressline2 AS addressLine2
            ,addressTown
            ,addressCounty
            ,postcode
            ,addressCountry
            ,organisation
            ,organisationType
            ,role
            ,telephoneNumber
            ,otherPhoneNumber
            ,faxNumber
            ,emailAddress
            ,webAddress
            ,serviceUserType
            ,caseReference 
            ,sourceSystem
            ,sourceSuid
            ,1 AS Source_priority -- Used to make sure an older/poorer quality source does not update the record
        FROM
            odw_harmonised_db.sb_service_user
        WHERE
            isActive = 'Y'
        LIMIT 0
        """)

    df.write.mode("Overwrite").format('delta').option("mergeSchema", "true").saveAsTable("odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user")
First, we're going to take the service bus data. That has a unique key that we can use to match on, and we need to ensure we maintain back office id's

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW service_user_temp
AS
SELECT
    id
    ,caseReference
    ,salutation
    ,FirstName
    ,lastName
    ,addressLine1
    ,addressLine2
    ,addressTown
    ,addressCounty
    ,postcode
    ,addressCountry
    ,organisation
    ,organisationType
    ,role
    ,telephoneNumber
    ,otherPhoneNumber
    ,faxNumber
    ,emailAddress
    ,webAddress
    ,serviceUserType
    ,sourceSystem
    ,sourceSUID
    ,1 AS Source_priority
FROM
    odw_harmonised_db.sb_service_user
WHERE
    IsActive = 'Y'

%%sql
MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user AS target
USING service_user_temp AS source
    ON source.id = target.id
    AND source.caseReference = target.caseReference
WHEN MATCHED THEN
    UPDATE
    SET
        salutation = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.salutation ELSE target.salutation END
        ,firstName = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.FirstName ELSE target.FirstName END
        ,lastName = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.lastName ELSE target.lastName END
        ,addressLine1 = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.addressLine1 ELSE target.addressLine1 END
        ,AddressLine2 = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.addressLine2 ELSE target.addressLine2 END
        ,addressTown = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.addressTown ELSE target.addressTown END
        ,addressCounty = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.addressCounty ELSE target.addressCounty END
        ,postcode = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.postcode ELSE target.postcode END
        ,addressCountry = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.addressCountry ELSE target.addressCountry END
        ,organisation = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.organisation ELSE target.organisation END
        ,organisationType = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.organisationType ELSE target.organisationType END
        ,role = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.role ELSE target.role END
        ,telephoneNumber = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.telephoneNumber ELSE target.telephoneNumber END
        ,otherPhoneNumber = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.otherPhoneNumber ELSE target.otherPhoneNumber END
        ,faxNumber = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.faxNumber ELSE target.faxNumber END
        ,emailAddress = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.emailAddress ELSE target.emailAddress END
        ,webAddress = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.webAddress ELSE target.webAddress END
        ,serviceUserType = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.serviceUserType ELSE target.serviceUserType END
        ,sourceSystem = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.sourceSystem ELSE target.sourceSystem END
        ,sourceSUID = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.sourceSUID ELSE target.sourceSUID END
        ,source_priority = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.Source_priority ELSE target.Source_priority END
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
    INSERT (
        id
        ,caseReference
        ,salutation
        ,firstName
        ,lastName
        ,addressLine1
        ,AddressLine2
        ,addressTown
        ,addressCounty
        ,postcode
        ,addressCountry
        ,organisation
        ,organisationType
        ,role
        ,telephoneNumber
        ,otherPhoneNumber
        ,faxNumber
        ,emailAddress
        ,webAddress
        ,serviceUserType
        ,sourceSystem
        ,sourceSUID
        ,Source_priority
            )
    VALUES (
        source.id
        ,source.caseReference
        ,source.salutation
        ,source.FirstName
        ,source.LastName
        ,source.addressLine1
        ,source.addressLine2
        ,source.addressTown
        ,source.addressCounty
        ,source.postcode
        ,source.addressCountry
        ,source.organisation
        ,source.organisationType
        ,source.role
        ,source.telephoneNumber
        ,source.otherPhoneNumber
        ,source.faxNumber
        ,source.emailAddress
        ,source.webAddress
        ,source.serviceUserType
        ,source.sourceSystem
        ,source.sourceSUID
        ,source.Source_priority
    )
Next, we need to look at the master service user table from Horizon for records that we haven't seen before

We have multiple ways we could match this data into the current service_user pot. We will stop at the first hit, and look at:
1. case reference, service user type, and URI match
2. case reference, service user type, Name (separate and joint components), address
3. case reference, service user type, Name (separate and joint components) and telephoneNumber,otherPhoneNumber, or fax
4. case reference, service user type, Name (separate and joint components) and emailAddress

The simplest is a URI match on the contactID from Horizon

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW vw_Horizon_casework_raw
AS
SELECT
    CAST(NULL AS String) AS Id
    ,salutation
    ,firstName
    ,lastName
    ,addressline1
    ,addressline2
    ,addressTown
    ,addressCounty
    ,postcode
    ,addressCountry
    ,organisation
    ,organisationType
    ,role
    ,telephoneNumber
    ,otherPhoneNumber
    ,faxNumber
    ,emailAddress
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS webAddress
    ,CASE serviceUserType
         WHEN 'Applicant' THEN
            'Applicant'
        WHEN 'Agent' THEN
            'Agent'
        WHEN 'Apellant' THEN
            'Appellant'
        WHEN 'Appellant' THEN
            'Appellant'
        WHEN 'tAppellant' THEN
            'Appellant'
    END AS serviceUserType
    ,caseReference 
    ,'Horizon' AS sourceSystem
    ,source.ContactID AS sourceSUID -- prefixes on the ContactID are dropped as these aren't consistent in Horizon and cause matching issues.
    ,caseInvolvementID
    ,2 AS Source_priority
FROM
    odw_harmonised_db.casework_case_involvement_dim AS source
WHERE
    source.IsActive = 'Y'
    AND CASE serviceUserType
         WHEN 'Applicant' THEN
            'Applicant'
        WHEN 'Agent' THEN
            'Agent'
        WHEN 'Apellant' THEN
            'Appellant'
        WHEN 'Appellant' THEN
            'Appellant'
        WHEN 'tAppellant' THEN
            'Appellant'
    END IS NOT NULL

%%sql
-- View for match criteria 1
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW vw_Horizon_URI_Match
AS
SELECT
    target.Id
    ,source.caseInvolvementID
FROM
    vw_Horizon_casework_raw AS source
    INNER JOIN odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user AS target
        ON source.CaseReference = target.caseReference
        AND source.serviceUserType = target.serviceUserType
        AND source.sourceSystem = target.sourceSystem
        AND source.sourceSUID = target.sourceSUID

%%sql
-- View for match criteria 2
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW vw_Horizon_name_Address_Match
AS
SELECT
    target.Id
    ,source.caseInvolvementID
FROM
    vw_Horizon_casework_raw AS source
    INNER JOIN odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user AS target
        ON source.CaseReference = target.caseReference
        AND source.serviceUserType = target.serviceUserType
        AND ( -- Name match
                CONCAT(COALESCE(source.firstName, ''), ' ', COALESCE(source.lastName, '')) = target.firstName -- some records have all name components merged into one record
                OR CONCAT(COALESCE(source.firstName, ''), ' ', COALESCE(source.lastName, '')) = target.lastName
                OR (-- separated name elements. Coalesce to cater for org only matches
                        COALESCE(source.firstName, '') = COALESCE(target.firstName, '')
                        AND COALESCE(source.lastName, '') = COALESCE(target.lastName, '')
                    )
                OR (-- some org records have been put in the first name, but also need to make sure this isn't a name
                    source.organisation = target.firstName 
                    AND (source.firstName <> target.firstName  AND source.lastName <> target.lastName)
                    AND CONCAT(COALESCE(source.firstName, ''), ' ', COALESCE(source.lastName, '')) <> target.firstName
                )
            )
        AND ( -- Address elements match
                COALESCE(source.AddressLine1, '') = COALESCE(target.AddressLine1, '')
                AND COALESCE(source.AddressLine2, '') = COALESCE(target.AddressLine2, '')
                AND COALESCE(source.addressTown, '') = COALESCE(target.addressTown, '')
                AND COALESCE(source.addressCounty, '') = COALESCE(target.addressCounty, '')
                AND COALESCE(source.postcode, '') = COALESCE(target.postcode, '')
                AND COALESCE(source.organisation, '') = COALESCE(target.organisation, '')
                AND CONCAT(COALESCE(source.AddressLine1, ''),COALESCE(source.AddressLine2, ''), COALESCE(source.addressTown, '') , COALESCE(source.addressCounty, ''), COALESCE(source.postcode, ''), COALESCE(source.organisation, '')) <> ''
            )

%%sql
-- View for match criteria 3
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW vw_Horizon_name_Tel_Match
AS
SELECT
    target.Id
    ,source.caseInvolvementID
FROM
    vw_Horizon_casework_raw AS source
    INNER JOIN odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user AS target
        ON source.CaseReference = target.caseReference
        AND source.serviceUserType = target.serviceUserType
        AND ( -- Name match
                CONCAT(COALESCE(source.firstName, ''), ' ', COALESCE(source.lastName, '')) = target.firstName -- some records have all name components merged into one record
                OR CONCAT(COALESCE(source.firstName, ''), ' ', COALESCE(source.lastName, '')) = target.lastName
                OR (-- separated name elements. Coalesce to cater for org only matches
                        COALESCE(source.firstName, '') = COALESCE(target.firstName, '')
                        AND COALESCE(source.lastName, '') = COALESCE(target.lastName, '')
                    )
                OR (-- some org records have been put in the first name, but also need to make sure this isn't a name
                    source.organisation = target.firstName 
                    AND (source.firstName <> target.firstName  AND source.lastName <> target.lastName)
                    AND CONCAT(COALESCE(source.firstName, ''), ' ', COALESCE(source.lastName, '')) <> target.firstName
                )
            )
        AND ( -- At least one telephone element matches
                source.telephoneNumber = target.telephoneNumber
                OR source.otherPhoneNumber = target.otherPhoneNumber
                OR source.faxNumber = target.faxNumber
            )

%%sql
-- View for match criteria 4
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW vw_Horizon_email_match
AS
SELECT
    target.Id
    ,source.caseInvolvementID
FROM
    vw_Horizon_casework_raw AS source
    INNER JOIN odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user AS target
        ON source.CaseReference = target.caseReference
        AND source.serviceUserType = target.serviceUserType
        AND ( -- Name match
                CONCAT(COALESCE(source.firstName, ''), ' ', COALESCE(source.lastName, '')) = target.firstName -- some records have all name components merged into one record
                OR CONCAT(COALESCE(source.firstName, ''), ' ', COALESCE(source.lastName, '')) = target.lastName
                OR (-- separated name elements. Coalesce to cater for org only matches
                        COALESCE(source.firstName, '') = COALESCE(target.firstName, '')
                        AND COALESCE(source.lastName, '') = COALESCE(target.lastName, '')
                    )
                OR (-- some org records have been put in the first name, but also need to make sure this isn't a name
                    source.organisation = target.firstName 
                    AND (source.firstName <> target.firstName  AND source.lastName <> target.lastName)
                    AND CONCAT(COALESCE(source.firstName, ''), ' ', COALESCE(source.lastName, '')) <> target.firstName
                )
            )
        AND ( -- Email matches
                source.emailAddress = target.emailAddress
            )

%%sql
-- View to dedupe results and make sure we have a one to one mapping on upsert
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW vw_Horizon_Upsert
AS
WITH match_results 
AS
(
    SELECT
        Id
        ,caseInvolvementID
    FROM
        vw_Horizon_URI_Match
    UNION
    SELECT
        address.Id
        ,address.caseInvolvementID
    FROM
        vw_Horizon_name_Address_Match AS address
        LEFT OUTER JOIN vw_Horizon_URI_Match AS uri
            ON address.caseInvolvementID = uri.caseInvolvementID
    WHERE
        uri.caseInvolvementID IS NULL
    UNION
    SELECT
        tel.Id
        ,tel.caseInvolvementID
    FROM
        vw_Horizon_name_Tel_Match AS tel
        LEFT OUTER JOIN vw_Horizon_name_Address_Match AS address
            ON tel.caseInvolvementID = address.caseInvolvementID
        LEFT OUTER JOIN vw_Horizon_URI_Match AS uri
            ON tel.caseInvolvementID = uri.caseInvolvementID
    WHERE
        uri.caseInvolvementID IS NULL
        AND address.caseInvolvementID IS NULL
    UNION
    SELECT
        email.Id
        ,email.caseInvolvementID
    FROM
        vw_Horizon_email_match AS email
        LEFT OUTER JOIN vw_Horizon_name_Tel_Match AS tel
            ON email.caseInvolvementID = tel.caseInvolvementID
        LEFT OUTER JOIN vw_Horizon_name_Address_Match AS address
            ON email.caseInvolvementID = address.caseInvolvementID
        LEFT OUTER JOIN vw_Horizon_URI_Match AS uri
            ON email.caseInvolvementID = uri.caseInvolvementID
    WHERE
        uri.caseInvolvementID IS NULL
        AND address.caseInvolvementID IS NULL
        AND tel.caseInvolvementID IS NULL
),
dedupe
AS
(
    SELECT
        Row_number() OVER(PARTITION BY id ORDER BY CaseInvolvementID DESC) AS MatchID
        ,Id
        ,CaseInvolvementID
    FROM
        match_results
)

SELECT 
    dedupe.Id
    ,raw.salutation
    ,raw.firstName
    ,raw.lastName
    ,raw.addressline1
    ,raw.addressline2
    ,raw.addressTown
    ,raw.addressCounty
    ,raw.postcode
    ,raw.addressCountry
    ,raw.organisation
    ,raw.organisationType
    ,raw.role
    ,raw.telephoneNumber
    ,raw.otherPhoneNumber
    ,raw.faxNumber
    ,raw.emailAddress
    ,raw.webAddress
    ,raw.serviceUserType
    ,raw.caseReference 
    ,raw.sourceSystem
    ,raw.sourceSUID
    ,raw.Source_priority
FROM
    vw_Horizon_casework_raw AS raw
    LEFT OUTER JOIN dedupe
        ON raw.CaseInvolvementID = dedupe.CaseInvolvementID
        AND MatchID = 1

%%sql
MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user AS target
USING vw_Horizon_Upsert AS source
    ON source.id = target.id
    AND source.caseReference = target.caseReference
WHEN MATCHED THEN
    UPDATE
    SET
        salutation = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.salutation ELSE target.salutation END
        ,firstName = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.FirstName ELSE target.FirstName END
        ,lastName = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.LastName ELSE target.LastName END
        ,addressLine1 = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.addressLine1 ELSE target.addressLine1 END
        ,AddressLine2 = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.addressLine2 ELSE target.addressLine2 END
        ,addressTown = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.addressTown ELSE target.addressTown END
        ,addressCounty = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.addressCounty ELSE target.addressCounty END
        ,postcode = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.postcode ELSE target.postcode END
        ,addressCountry = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.addressCountry ELSE target.addressCountry END
        ,organisation = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.organisation ELSE target.organisation END
        ,organisationType = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.organisationType ELSE target.organisationType END
        ,role = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.role ELSE target.role END
        ,telephoneNumber = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.telephoneNumber ELSE target.telephoneNumber END
        ,otherPhoneNumber = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.otherPhoneNumber ELSE target.otherPhoneNumber END
        ,faxNumber = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.faxNumber ELSE target.faxNumber END
        ,emailAddress = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.emailAddress ELSE target.emailAddress END
        ,webAddress = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.webAddress ELSE target.webAddress END
        ,serviceUserType = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.serviceUserType ELSE target.serviceUserType END
        ,sourceSystem = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.sourceSystem ELSE target.sourceSystem END
        ,sourceSUID = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.sourceSUID ELSE target.sourceSUID END
        ,source_priority = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.source_priority ELSE target.source_priority END
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
    INSERT (
        id
        ,caseReference
        ,salutation
        ,firstName
        ,lastName
        ,addressLine1
        ,AddressLine2
        ,addressTown
        ,addressCounty
        ,postcode
        ,addressCountry
        ,organisation
        ,organisationType
        ,role
        ,telephoneNumber
        ,otherPhoneNumber
        ,faxNumber
        ,emailAddress
        ,webAddress
        ,serviceUserType
        ,sourceSystem
        ,sourceSUID
        ,source_priority
            )
    VALUES (
        source.id
        ,source.caseReference
        ,source.salutation
        ,source.FirstName
        ,source.lastName
        ,source.addressLine1
        ,source.addressLine2
        ,source.addressTown
        ,source.addressCounty
        ,source.postcode
        ,source.addressCountry
        ,source.organisation
        ,source.organisationType
        ,source.role
        ,source.telephoneNumber
        ,source.otherPhoneNumber
        ,source.faxNumber
        ,source.emailAddress
        ,source.webAddress
        ,source.serviceUserType
        ,source.sourceSystem
        ,source.sourceSUID
        ,source.source_priority
Next, we need to look at s51 records and see if we have any more to map in

%%sql -- Add missing records from s51
INSERT INTO odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user
SELECT 
    CAST(NULL AS String) AS id
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS salutation
    ,source.EnquirerFirstName AS firstName
    ,source.EnquirerLastName AS lastName
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS addressline1
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS addressline2
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS addressTown
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS addressCounty
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS postcode
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS addressCountry
    ,source.Agent AS organisation
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS organisationType
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS role
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS telephoneNumber
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS otherPhoneNumber
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS faxNumber
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS emailAddress
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS webAddress
    ,CASE 
        WHEN source.Agent IS NOT NULL THEN
            'Agent'
        ELSE
            'Applicant' 
    END AS serviceUserType
    ,source.caseId AS caseReference 
    ,source.ODTSourceSystem AS sourceSystem 
    ,CAST(source.adviceId AS String) AS sourceSuid
    ,10 AS source_priority
FROM
    odw_harmonised_db.nsip_s51_advice AS source
    LEFT OUTER JOIN odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user AS target
        ON source.caseId = target.caseReference
        AND CASE 
                WHEN source.Agent IS NOT NULL THEN
                    'Agent'
                ELSE
                    'Applicant' 
            END = target.serviceUserType
        AND (
              ( -- separate name elements match
                source.EnquirerFirstName = target.firstName
                AND source.EnquirerLastName = target.lastName
              )  
              OR ( -- combined name elements match
                source.from = target.firstname
                OR source.from = target.lastName
                )   
              OR 
              (
                        source.agent = target.firstname
                        OR source.agent = target.lastName
                        OR source.agent = target.organisation
                ) 
            )
WHERE
   source.isActive = 'Y'
   AND target.id IS NULL
Next we look to merge in NSIP project data

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW vw_nsip_project
AS
SELECT
    CAST(NULL AS String) AS id
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS salutation
    ,applicantFirstName AS firstName
    ,applicantLastName AS lastName
    ,addressline1
    ,addressline2
    ,addressTown
    ,addressCounty
    ,postcode
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS addressCountry
    ,promotername AS organisation
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS organisationType
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS role
    ,applicantphonenumber AS telephoneNumber
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS otherPhoneNumber
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS faxNumber
    ,applicantemailaddress AS emailAddress
    ,applicantwebaddress AS webAddress
    ,'Applicant' AS serviceUserType
    ,source.caseid AS caseReference 
    ,source.ODTSourceSystem AS sourceSystem 
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS sourceSuid
    ,NSIPProjectInfoInternalID
    ,3 AS Source_priority
FROM
    odw_harmonised_db.nsip_project AS source
WHERE
    isActive = 'Y'

Now we need to match the existing records in. Again as with Horizon data earlier, we have multiple passes:
1. case reference, service user type, Name (separate and joint components), address
2. case reference, service user type, Name (separate and joint components) and telephoneNumber
3. case reference, service user type, Name (separate and joint components) and emailAddress

%%sql
--View for match criteria 1
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW vw_match_nsip_address
AS
SELECT
    target.id
    ,source.NSIPProjectInfoInternalID
FROM
    vw_nsip_project AS source
    INNER JOIN odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user AS target
        ON source.CaseReference = target.caseReference
        AND source.serviceUserType = target.serviceUserType
        AND ( -- Name match
                CONCAT(COALESCE(source.firstName, ''), ' ', COALESCE(source.lastName, '')) = target.firstName -- some records have all name components merged into one record
                OR (-- separated name elements. Coalesce to cater for org only matches
                        COALESCE(source.firstName, '') = COALESCE(target.firstName, '')
                        AND COALESCE(source.lastName, '') = COALESCE(target.lastName, '')
                    )
                OR (-- some org records have been put in the first name, but also need to make sure this isn't a name
                    source.organisation = target.firstName 
                    AND (source.firstName <> target.firstName  AND source.lastName <> target.lastName)
                    AND CONCAT(COALESCE(source.firstName, ''), ' ', COALESCE(source.lastName, '')) <> target.firstName
                    )
            )
        AND ( -- Address elements match
                COALESCE(source.AddressLine1, '') = COALESCE(target.AddressLine1, '')
                AND COALESCE(source.AddressLine2, '') = COALESCE(target.AddressLine2, '')
                AND COALESCE(source.addressTown, '') = COALESCE(target.addressTown, '')
                AND COALESCE(source.addressCounty, '') = COALESCE(target.addressCounty, '')
                AND COALESCE(source.postcode, '') = COALESCE(target.postcode, '')
                AND COALESCE(source.organisation, '') = COALESCE(target.organisation, '')
                AND CONCAT(COALESCE(source.AddressLine1, ''),COALESCE(source.AddressLine2, ''), COALESCE(source.addressTown, '') , COALESCE(source.addressCounty, ''), COALESCE(source.postcode, ''), COALESCE(source.organisation, '')) <> ''

%%sql
--View for match criteria 2
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW vw_match_nsip_Telephone
AS
SELECT
    target.id
    ,source.NSIPProjectInfoInternalID
FROM
    vw_nsip_project AS source
    INNER JOIN odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user AS target
        ON source.CaseReference = target.caseReference

        AND ( -- Name match
                CONCAT(COALESCE(source.firstName, ''), ' ', COALESCE(source.lastName, '')) = target.firstName -- some records have all name components merged into one record
                OR (-- separated name elements. Coalesce to cater for org only matches
                        COALESCE(source.firstName, '') = COALESCE(target.firstName, '')
                        AND COALESCE(source.lastName, '') = COALESCE(target.lastName, '')
                    )
                OR (-- some org records have been put in the first name, but also need to make sure this isn't a name
                    source.organisation = target.firstName 
                    AND (source.firstName <> target.firstName  AND source.lastName <> target.lastName)
                    AND CONCAT(COALESCE(source.firstName, ''), ' ', COALESCE(source.lastName, '')) <> target.firstName
                    )
            )
        AND ( -- Telephone elements match
                source.telephoneNumber = target.telephoneNumber

%%sql

AS

    ,source.NSIPProjectInfoInternalID

                    )

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW vw_nsip_input
AS
with base
AS
(
    SELECT
        addr.id
        ,addr.NSIPProjectInfoInternalID
    FROM
        vw_match_nsip_address AS addr
    UNION
    SELECT
        tel.id
        ,tel.NSIPProjectInfoInternalID
    FROM
        vw_match_nsip_Telephone as Tel
        LEFT OUTER JOIN vw_match_nsip_address as Addr
            ON tel.NSIPProjectInfoInternalID = Addr.NSIPProjectInfoInternalID
    WHERE
        Addr.NSIPProjectInfoInternalID IS NULL
    UNION
    SELECT
        Email.id
        ,Email.NSIPProjectInfoInternalID
    FROM
        vw_match_nsip_Email as Email
        LEFT OUTER JOIN vw_match_nsip_address as Addr
            ON Email.NSIPProjectInfoInternalID = Addr.NSIPProjectInfoInternalID
        LEFT OUTER JOIN vw_match_nsip_Telephone as Tel
            ON Email.NSIPProjectInfoInternalID = Tel.NSIPProjectInfoInternalID
    WHERE
        Addr.NSIPProjectInfoInternalID IS NULL
        AND Tel.NSIPProjectInfoInternalID IS NULL
),
Dedupe
AS
(
    SELECT
        row_Number() Over (Partition BY id ORDER BY NSIPProjectInfoInternalID DESC) AS Update_row
        ,id
        ,NSIPProjectInfoInternalID
    FROM
        base
)
SELECT
   Dedupe.id
    ,Base.salutation
    ,Base.firstName
    ,Base.lastName
    ,Base.addressline1
    ,Base.addressline2
    ,Base.addressTown
    ,Base.addressCounty
    ,Base.postcode
    ,Base.addressCountry
    ,Base.organisation
    ,Base.organisationType
    ,Base.role
    ,Base.telephoneNumber
    ,Base.otherPhoneNumber
    ,Base.faxNumber
    ,Base.emailAddress
    ,Base.webAddress
    ,Base.serviceUserType
    ,Base.caseReference 
    ,Base.sourceSystem 
    ,Base.sourceSuid
    ,Base.Source_priority
FROM
    vw_nsip_project AS Base
    LEFT OUTER JOIN Dedupe
        ON Base.NSIPProjectInfoInternalID = Dedupe.NSIPProjectInfoInternalID
        AND Dedupe.Update_row = 1

%%sql
MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user AS target
USING vw_nsip_input AS source
    ON source.id = target.id
    AND source.caseReference = target.caseReference
WHEN MATCHED THEN
    UPDATE
    SET
        salutation = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.salutation ELSE target.salutation END
        ,firstName =  CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.FirstName ELSE target.FirstName END
        ,lastName =  CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.LastName ELSE target.LastName END
        ,addressLine1 =  CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.addressLine1 ELSE target.addressLine1 END
        ,AddressLine2 =  CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.addressLine2 ELSE target.addressLine2 END
        ,addressTown =  CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.addressTown ELSE target.addressTown END
        ,addressCounty =  CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.addressCounty ELSE target.addressCounty END
        ,postcode =  CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.postcode ELSE target.postcode END
        ,addressCountry =  CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.addressCountry ELSE target.addressCountry END
        ,organisation =  CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.organisation ELSE target.organisation END
        ,organisationType =  CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.organisationType ELSE target.organisationType END
        ,role =  CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.role ELSE target.role END
        ,telephoneNumber =  CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.telephoneNumber ELSE target.telephoneNumber END
        ,otherPhoneNumber =  CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.otherPhoneNumber ELSE target.otherPhoneNumber END
        ,faxNumber =  CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.faxNumber ELSE target.faxNumber END
        ,emailAddress =  CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.emailAddress ELSE target.emailAddress END
        ,webAddress =  CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.webAddress ELSE target.webAddress END
        ,serviceUserType =  CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.serviceUserType ELSE target.serviceUserType END
        ,sourceSystem =  CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.sourceSystem ELSE target.sourceSystem END
        ,sourceSUID =  CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.sourceSUID ELSE target.sourceSUID END
        ,source_priority =  CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.source_priority ELSE target.source_priority END
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
    INSERT (
        id
        ,caseReference
        ,salutation
        ,firstName
        ,lastName
        ,addressLine1
        ,AddressLine2
        ,addressTown
        ,addressCounty
        ,postcode
        ,addressCountry
        ,organisation
        ,organisationType
        ,role
        ,telephoneNumber
        ,otherPhoneNumber
        ,faxNumber
        ,emailAddress
        ,webAddress
        ,serviceUserType
        ,sourceSystem
        ,sourceSUID
        ,source_priority
            )
    VALUES (
        source.id
        ,source.caseReference
        ,source.salutation
        ,source.FirstName
        ,source.lastName
        ,source.addressLine1
        ,source.addressLine2
        ,source.addressTown
        ,source.addressCounty
        ,source.postcode
        ,source.addressCountry
        ,source.organisation
        ,source.organisationType
        ,source.role
        ,source.telephoneNumber
        ,source.otherPhoneNumber
        ,source.faxNumber
        ,source.emailAddress
        ,source.webAddress
        ,source.serviceUserType
        ,source.sourceSystem
        ,source.sourceSUID
        ,source.source_priority
Need to bring in relevant reps data

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW vw_rel_reps_raw
AS
SELECT
    CAST(NULL AS String) AS id
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS salutation
    ,source.fullname AS firstName
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS lastName
    ,source.buildingnumber AS addressline1
    ,source.street AS addressline2
    ,source.town AS addressTown
    ,source.county AS addressCounty
    ,source.postcode AS postcode
    ,source.country AS addressCountry
    ,source.organisationname AS organisation
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS organisationType
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS role
    ,source.phonenumber AS telephoneNumber
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS otherPhoneNumber
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS faxNumber
    ,source.emailaddress AS emailAddress
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS webAddress
    ,'RepresentationContact' AS serviceUserType
    ,source.caseId AS caseReference 
    ,source.ODTSourceSystem AS sourceSystem 
    ,CAST(representativeId AS String) AS sourceSuid
    ,NSIPRepresentaionID
    ,4 AS source_priority
FROM
    odw_harmonised_db.nsip_representation AS source
WHERE
    isActive = 'Y'
    AND representativeId IS NOT NULL
UNION
SELECT
    CAST(NULL AS String) AS id
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS salutation
    ,source.AgentFullName AS firstName
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS lastName
    ,agentBuildingNumber AS addressline1
    ,agentStreet AS addressline2
    ,agentTown AS addressTown
    ,agentCounty AS addressCounty
    ,agentPostcode AS postcode
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS addressCountry
    ,source.AgentOrganisationName AS organisation
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS organisationType
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS role
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS telephoneNumber
    ,agent_phonenumber AS otherPhoneNumber
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS faxNumber
    ,agent_emailaddress AS emailAddress
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS webAddress
    ,'Agent' AS serviceUserType
    ,source.caseId AS caseReference 
    ,source.ODTSourceSystem AS sourceSystem 
    ,CAST(source.agentcontactid AS String) AS sourceSuid
    ,NSIPRepresentaionID
    ,4 AS source_priority
FROM
    odw_harmonised_db.nsip_representation AS source
WHERE
    isActive = 'Y'
    AND agentcontactid IS NOT NULL
UNION
SELECT
    CAST(NULL AS String) AS id
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS salutation
    ,source.fullname AS firstName
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS lastName
    ,source.buildingnumber AS addressline1
    ,source.street AS addressline2
    ,source.town AS addressTown
    ,source.county AS addressCounty
    ,source.postcode AS postcode
    ,source.country AS addressCountry
    ,source.organisationname AS organisation
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS organisationType
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS role
    ,source.phonenumber AS telephoneNumber
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS otherPhoneNumber
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS faxNumber
    ,source.emailaddress AS emailAddress
    ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS webAddress
    ,'Applicant' AS serviceUserType
    ,source.caseId AS caseReference 
    ,source.ODTSourceSystem AS sourceSystem 
    ,CAST(representedId AS String) AS sourceSuid
    ,NSIPRepresentaionID
    ,4 AS source_priority
FROM
    odw_harmonised_db.nsip_representation AS source
WHERE
    isActive = 'Y'
    AND representedId IS NOT NULL

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW vw_rel_reps_URI_match
AS
SELECT
    target.Id
   ,source.NSIPRepresentaionID
FROM
    vw_rel_reps_raw AS source
    INNER JOIN odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user AS target
        ON source.CaseReference = target.caseReference
        AND source.serviceUserType = target.serviceUserType
        AND source.sourceSystem = target.sourceSystem
        AND source.sourceSUID = target.sourceSUID

%%sql
-- View for match criteria 2
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW vw_rel_reps_name_Address_Match
AS
SELECT
    target.Id
    ,source.NSIPRepresentaionID
FROM
    vw_rel_reps_raw AS source
    INNER JOIN odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user AS target
        ON source.CaseReference = target.caseReference
        AND source.serviceUserType = target.serviceUserType
        AND ( -- Name match
                CONCAT(COALESCE(source.firstName, ''), ' ', COALESCE(source.lastName, '')) = target.firstName -- some records have all name components merged into one record
                OR CONCAT(COALESCE(source.firstName, ''), ' ', COALESCE(source.lastName, '')) = target.lastName
                OR (-- separated name elements. Coalesce to cater for org only matches
                        COALESCE(source.firstName, '') = COALESCE(target.firstName, '')
                        AND COALESCE(source.lastName, '') = COALESCE(target.lastName, '')
                    )
                OR (-- some org records have been put in the first name, but also need to make sure this isn't a name
                    source.organisation = target.firstName 
                    AND (source.firstName <> target.firstName  AND source.lastName <> target.lastName)
                    AND CONCAT(COALESCE(source.firstName, ''), ' ', COALESCE(source.lastName, '')) <> target.firstName
                )
            )
        AND ( -- Address elements match
                COALESCE(source.AddressLine1, '') = COALESCE(target.AddressLine1, '')
                AND COALESCE(source.AddressLine2, '') = COALESCE(target.AddressLine2, '')
                AND COALESCE(source.addressTown, '') = COALESCE(target.addressTown, '')
                AND COALESCE(source.addressCounty, '') = COALESCE(target.addressCounty, '')
                AND COALESCE(source.postcode, '') = COALESCE(target.postcode, '')
                AND COALESCE(source.organisation, '') = COALESCE(target.organisation, '')
                AND CONCAT(COALESCE(source.AddressLine1, ''),COALESCE(source.AddressLine2, ''), COALESCE(source.addressTown, '') , COALESCE(source.addressCounty, ''), COALESCE(source.postcode, ''), COALESCE(source.organisation, '')) <> ''
            )

%%sql
--View for match criteria 2
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW vw_rel_reps_name_Tel_Match
AS
SELECT
    target.id
    ,source.NSIPRepresentaionID
FROM
    vw_rel_reps_raw AS source
    INNER JOIN odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user AS target
        ON source.CaseReference = target.caseReference
        AND source.serviceUserType = target.serviceUserType
        AND ( -- Name match
                CONCAT(COALESCE(source.firstName, ''), ' ', COALESCE(source.lastName, '')) = target.firstName -- some records have all name components merged into one record
                OR (-- separated name elements. Coalesce to cater for org only matches
                        COALESCE(source.firstName, '') = COALESCE(target.firstName, '')
                        AND COALESCE(source.lastName, '') = COALESCE(target.lastName, '')
                    )
                OR (-- some org records have been put in the first name, but also need to make sure this isn't a name
                    source.organisation = target.firstName 
                    AND (source.firstName <> target.firstName  AND source.lastName <> target.lastName)
                    AND CONCAT(COALESCE(source.firstName, ''), ' ', COALESCE(source.lastName, '')) <> target.firstName
                    )
            )
        AND ( -- Telephone elements match
                source.telephoneNumber = target.telephoneNumber

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW vw_rel_reps_email_match
AS
SELECT
    target.Id
    ,source.NSIPRepresentaionID
FROM
    vw_rel_reps_raw AS source
    INNER JOIN odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user AS target
        ON source.CaseReference = target.caseReference
        AND source.serviceUserType = target.serviceUserType
        AND ( -- Name match
                CONCAT(COALESCE(source.firstName, ''), ' ', COALESCE(source.lastName, '')) = target.firstName -- some records have all name components merged into one record
                OR CONCAT(COALESCE(source.firstName, ''), ' ', COALESCE(source.lastName, '')) = target.lastName
                OR (-- separated name elements. Coalesce to cater for org only matches
                        COALESCE(source.firstName, '') = COALESCE(target.firstName, '')
                        AND COALESCE(source.lastName, '') = COALESCE(target.lastName, '')
                    )
                OR (-- some org records have been put in the first name, but also need to make sure this isn't a name
                    source.organisation = target.firstName 
                    AND (source.firstName <> target.firstName  AND source.lastName <> target.lastName)
                    AND CONCAT(COALESCE(source.firstName, ''), ' ', COALESCE(source.lastName, '')) <> target.firstName
                )
            )
        AND ( -- Email matches
                source.emailAddress = target.emailAddress

%%sql
-- View to dedupe results and make sure we have a one to one mapping on upsert
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW vw_rel_reps_Upsert
AS
WITH match_results 
AS
(
    SELECT
        Id
        ,NSIPRepresentaionID
    FROM
        vw_rel_reps_URI_Match
    UNION
    SELECT
        address.Id
        ,address.NSIPRepresentaionID
    FROM
        vw_rel_reps_name_Address_Match AS address
        LEFT OUTER JOIN vw_rel_reps_URI_Match AS uri
            ON address.NSIPRepresentaionID = uri.NSIPRepresentaionID
    WHERE
        uri.NSIPRepresentaionID IS NULL
    UNION
    SELECT
        tel.Id
        ,tel.NSIPRepresentaionID
    FROM
        vw_rel_reps_name_Tel_Match AS tel
        LEFT OUTER JOIN vw_rel_reps_name_Address_Match AS address
            ON tel.NSIPRepresentaionID = address.NSIPRepresentaionID
        LEFT OUTER JOIN vw_rel_reps_URI_Match AS uri
            ON tel.NSIPRepresentaionID = uri.NSIPRepresentaionID
    WHERE
        uri.NSIPRepresentaionID IS NULL
        AND address.NSIPRepresentaionID IS NULL
    UNION
    SELECT
        email.Id
        ,email.NSIPRepresentaionID
    FROM
        vw_rel_reps_email_match AS email
        LEFT OUTER JOIN vw_rel_reps_name_Tel_Match AS tel
            ON email.NSIPRepresentaionID = tel.NSIPRepresentaionID
        LEFT OUTER JOIN vw_rel_reps_name_Address_Match AS address
            ON email.NSIPRepresentaionID = address.NSIPRepresentaionID
        LEFT OUTER JOIN vw_rel_reps_URI_Match AS uri
            ON email.NSIPRepresentaionID = uri.NSIPRepresentaionID
    WHERE
        uri.NSIPRepresentaionID IS NULL
        AND address.NSIPRepresentaionID IS NULL
        AND tel.NSIPRepresentaionID IS NULL
),
dedupe
AS
(
    SELECT
        Row_number() OVER(PARTITION BY id ORDER BY NSIPRepresentaionID DESC) AS MatchID
        ,Id
        ,NSIPRepresentaionID
    FROM
        match_results
)

SELECT 
    dedupe.Id
    ,raw.salutation
    ,raw.firstName
    ,raw.lastName
    ,raw.addressline1
    ,raw.addressline2
    ,raw.addressTown
    ,raw.addressCounty
    ,raw.postcode
    ,raw.addressCountry
    ,raw.organisation
    ,raw.organisationType
    ,raw.role
    ,raw.telephoneNumber
    ,raw.otherPhoneNumber
    ,raw.faxNumber
    ,raw.emailAddress
    ,raw.webAddress
    ,raw.serviceUserType
    ,raw.caseReference 
    ,raw.sourceSystem
    ,raw.sourceSUID
    ,raw.Source_priority
FROM
    vw_rel_reps_raw AS raw
    LEFT OUTER JOIN dedupe
        ON raw.NSIPRepresentaionID = dedupe.NSIPRepresentaionID
        AND MatchID = 1

%%sql
MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user AS target
USING vw_rel_reps_Upsert AS source
    ON source.id = target.id
    AND source.caseReference = target.caseReference
WHEN MATCHED THEN
    UPDATE
    SET
        salutation = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.salutation ELSE target.salutation END
        ,firstName = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.FirstName ELSE target.FirstName END
        ,lastName = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.LastName ELSE target.LastName END
        ,addressLine1 = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.addressLine1 ELSE target.addressLine1 END
        ,AddressLine2 = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.addressLine2 ELSE target.addressLine2 END
        ,addressTown = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.addressTown ELSE target.addressTown END
        ,addressCounty = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.addressCounty ELSE target.addressCounty END
        ,postcode = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.postcode ELSE target.postcode END
        ,addressCountry = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.addressCountry ELSE target.addressCountry END
        ,organisation = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.organisation ELSE target.organisation END
        ,organisationType = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.organisationType ELSE target.organisationType END
        ,role = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.role ELSE target.role END
        ,telephoneNumber = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.telephoneNumber  ELSE target.telephoneNumber END
        ,otherPhoneNumber = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.otherPhoneNumber ELSE target.otherPhoneNumber END
        ,faxNumber = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.faxNumber ELSE target.faxNumber END
        ,emailAddress = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.emailAddress ELSE target.emailAddress END
        ,webAddress = CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.webAddress ELSE target.webAddress END
        ,serviceUserType =   CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.serviceUserType ELSE target.serviceUserType END
        ,sourceSystem =   CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.sourceSystem ELSE target.sourceSystem END
        ,sourceSUID =   CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.sourceSUID ELSE target.sourceSUID END
        ,source_priority =  CASE WHEN source.Source_priority <= target.source_priority THEN source.Source_priority ELSE target.source_priority END
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
    INSERT (
        id
        ,caseReference
        ,salutation
        ,firstName
        ,lastName
        ,addressLine1
        ,AddressLine2
        ,addressTown
        ,addressCounty
        ,postcode
        ,addressCountry
        ,organisation
        ,organisationType
        ,role
        ,telephoneNumber
        ,otherPhoneNumber
        ,faxNumber
        ,emailAddress
        ,webAddress
        ,serviceUserType
        ,sourceSystem
        ,sourceSUID
        ,source_priority
            )
    VALUES (
        source.id
        ,source.caseReference
        ,source.salutation
        ,source.FirstName
        ,source.lastName
        ,source.addressLine1
        ,source.addressLine2
        ,source.addressTown
        ,source.addressCounty
        ,source.postcode
        ,source.addressCountry
        ,source.organisation
        ,source.organisationType
        ,source.role
        ,source.telephoneNumber
        ,source.otherPhoneNumber
        ,source.faxNumber
        ,source.emailAddress
        ,source.webAddress
        ,source.serviceUserType
        ,source.sourceSystem
        ,source.sourceSUID
        ,source.source_priority
## To do: Need to include Zendesk records
#Could be interest parties or complainants. If unable to match <Gareth to confirm>
Need to set Ids for records we've not seen before

#Note: 15236925 seems the start of a reserved range, below that is all Horizon data. Have to assume that the id's on that are created by previous ODW code and that these must be preserved. Aiming to find a gap between the two for new records
df = spark.sql("""
            SELECT
                Row_Number() OVER (ORDER BY caseReference ASC) + (SELECT MAX(CAST(id as integer)) FROM odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user WHERE id < 15236925) AS id
                ,salutation
                ,firstName
                ,lastName
                ,addressLine1
                ,addressLine2
                ,addressTown
                ,addressCounty
                ,postcode
                ,addressCountry
                ,organisation
                ,organisationType
                ,role
                ,telephoneNumber
                ,otherPhoneNumber
                ,faxNumber
                ,emailAddress
                ,webAddress
                ,serviceUserType
                ,caseReference
                ,sourceSystem
                ,sourceSuid
                ,source_priority
            FROM
                odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user
            WHERE
                id IS NULL
            UNION
            SELECT
                id
                ,salutation
                ,firstName
                ,lastName
                ,addressLine1
                ,addressLine2
                ,addressTown
                ,addressCounty
                ,postcode
                ,addressCountry
                ,organisation
                ,organisationType
                ,role
                ,telephoneNumber
                ,otherPhoneNumber
                ,faxNumber
                ,emailAddress
                ,webAddress
                ,serviceUserType
                ,caseReference
                ,sourceSystem
                ,sourceSuid
                ,source_priority
            FROM
                odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user
            WHERE
                id IS NOT NULL"""
    )

df.write.mode("overwrite").option("overwriteSchema", "true").option("mergeSchema", "true").format("delta").partitionBy("serviceUserType").saveAsTable("odw_harmonised_db.curated_service_user")

    if(len(df) > 0):
        fake = Faker()
        
        df['firstName'] = [fake.first_name() for _ in range(len(df))]
        df['lastName'] = [fake.last_name() for _ in range(len(df))]
        df['emailAddress'] = [fake.email() for _ in range(len(df))]
        df['telephoneNumber'] = [fake.phone_number() for _ in range(len(df))]
        df['otherPhoneNumber'] = [fake.phone_number() for _ in range(len(df))]
        df['faxNumber'] = [fake.phone_number() for _ in range(len(df))]
        
        df = spark.createDataFrame(df)

        table_loc = "abfss://odw-curated@"+storage_account+'service_user'
        df.write.mode("overwrite").partitionBy("serviceUserType").save(table_loc)
spark.conf.set("spark.sql.execution.arrow.pyspark.enabled", "true")
